[Page Title: The Pickled Palate | Charleston, SC]

Welcome
(scroll down) SCROLL DOWN 
Welcome
(scroll down) View fullsize 
A Destination

The Pickled Palate food wagon offers you a wonderful opportunity to escape  for lunch in our magical location. We offer fresh Italian panini made with local breads, homemade soups and wonderful salads.  We are located at the mainland container parked under the beautiful oak trees. Mainland is offering a full bar while we are in operation. Mainland container is a wonderful destination just a few minutes to Sullivans Island. So come see us and grab lunch on the way to the beach.
View fullsize 
Great Wine Selection

Large selection of wines and unique beers to purchase on premise or to go.  Enjoy a bottle outside in the garden
View fullsize 
Fresh Brewed Teas

Organic teas made fresh daily as well as Charleston Roaster Coffee.  We also offer cucumber and lemon water.
View fullsize 
Vintage Garden

Come escape in our magical vintage garden and enjoy a glass of wine, food with friends family and your favorite pet.  We are very dog friendly.

Eat Together

Great Food, Great Wine & Always Great Friends!

Eat Together

Great Food, Great Wine & Always Great Friends!
View fullsize View fullsize View fullsize View the full menu → 
Our Story

Thanks for an awesome elven years!

I opened this restaurant with a friend over eleven years ago and our business plan was that we planned to do business.

I am a Horticulturist and my at the time business partner was a retired police officer.

We opened with not much experience in the food and beverage buisness other then loving food, wine and the passion for hospitallity.

It’s been a great run and we have enjoyed feeding people from all over and especially enjoyed meeting everyone.

A big shout out to our locals and the friendships we have made.

I love and will miss feeding all of you! Lisa

The Pickled Palate

Great Wines & Local Food

When we created The Pickled Palate our goal was to provide a delicious & affordable dining experience in a welcoming environment. We hope that you come and visit us soon!
Visit us on Facebook! 
Check Out Our Great Reviews!
This place is FANTASTIC!! Probably the best panini I have ever had. Get the tuna melt! - Matt N. Yelp 
Super cute place, friendly staff & amazing food! The Italian panini was delicious, highly recommended. - Shana S.
